attributes.action: Create a cross party body to introduce an integrated NHS and Adult Care Service.
attributes.additional_details: The failure of successive governments to implement an integrated service has significantly contributed to the ongoing crisis in the NHS and social care. Royal Commissions and Parliamentary Reports have been followed by broken promises by government. "The historic political failure to take a long-term approach to the provision of health and adult social care has been a major stumbling block to longer-term sustainability" (Para. 334 House of Lords Select Committee Report 5.4.17)
attributes.background: Create a statutory body with cross party support/membership tasked to plan and drive through implementation of an integrated service with funding secured  on a ten year rolling basis.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630644
